sentences.en: A COBOL mnemonic name associated with the console typewriter.
sentences.cn: 和控制台打字机有关的一种COBOL助记忆名.

sentences.en: Damn this useless typewriter!
sentences.cn: 这台破打字机真该死!

sentences.en: Don't fiddle with the typewriter.
sentences.cn: 不要摆弄那架打字机了.

sentences.en: From somewhere distant he heard the clatter of a typewriter.
sentences.cn: 他听见从远处什么地方传来打字机的嗒嗒声。

sentences.en: He tapped out an article on the typewriter.
sentences.cn: 他用打字机打出了一篇文章。

sentences.en: He took all afternoon on each one of them, on account of having to hunt for each letter on the typewriter.
sentences.cn: 他每写一篇都花上整整一个下午的时间，因为他得在打字机上寻找每一个字母。

sentences.en: In most offices, the typewriter has now been supplanted by the computer.
sentences.cn: 当今许多办公室里, 打字机已被电脑取代.

sentences.en: Look at the keyboard of any standard typewriter or computer.
sentences.cn: 看看任何标准的打字机或计算机的键盘。

sentences.en: Please cover the typewriter after use.
sentences.cn: 用完后请把打字机罩好.

sentences.en: She handed over a form, then bobbed down again behind a typewriter.
sentences.cn: 她递过来一张表格，随后又立刻埋头在打字机后面忙活起来。

sentences.en: She has recently begun to slouch over her typewriter.
sentences.cn: 最近，她坐在打字机前就开始变得无精打采的。

sentences.en: She tapped out a letter on the typewriter.
sentences.cn: 她用打字机打出了一封信。

sentences.en: She took the liberty of using your typewriter while you were away.
sentences.cn: 你不在时,她擅自用你的打字机.

sentences.en: She took up a sheet and ratcheted it into the typewriter.
sentences.cn: 她拿起一张纸，把它哗哗啦啦地塞到打字机中。

sentences.en: The secretary transcribed those letters on the typewriter.
sentences.cn: 秘书用打字机打出了那些信。

sentences.en: The typewriter is obsolete.
sentences.cn: 这架打字机老掉牙了.

sentences.en: The typewriter was clattering away.
sentences.cn: 打字机啪嗒啪嗒地响着.

sentences.en: There was a comfortable-looking clerk on duty, tapping away on a manual typewriter.
sentences.cn: 有个神态安适的办事员在当班，在手动打字机上啪嗒啪嗒地打着字。

sentences.en: This typewriter jumps and needs repairing.
sentences.cn: 这台打字机跳字,需要修理.

sentences.en: Typewriter ribbons may be all black or black and red.
sentences.cn: 打字机的色带可以是全黑的或黑红色的.

words.tran_cn: 用打字机打出的，打字的
字型；铅字样；打字机字体
用打字机打（typewrite的现在分词）

trans.tran_en: a machine with keys that you press in order to print letters of the alphabet onto paper
